required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Investigation of Efficacy and Tolerability of a Lactic Acid Containing Vaginal Suppository in Post-menopausal Women With VVA
clinical_study.official_title: Prospective, Open-label, Monocenter, Trial to Investigate the Efficacy and Tolerability of WO533, a Lactic Acid Containing Vaginal Suppository, in a Panel of Post-menopausal Women Suffering From Vulvovaginal Atrophy (VVA)

lead_sponsor.agency: Dr. August Wolff GmbH & Co. KG Arzneimittel

collaborator.agency: proDERM Institut f√ºr Angewandte Dermatologische Forschung GmbH

clinical_study.source: Dr. August Wolff GmbH & Co. KG Arzneimittel

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of the study is to investigate the efficacy and tolerability of a lactic acid containing vaginal suppository with respect to the application in post-menopausal women with VVA.

primary_outcome.description: Change of the Vaginal Maturation Index (VMI)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 to 8, day 8 to 43, and day 1 to 43
Day 1 to 8, day 8 to 43, and day 1 to 43
secondary_outcome.description: Change of severity scoring for each of the subjective symptoms (dryness, itching, burning and pain unrelated to sexual intercourse) and as sum score

secondary_outcome.measure: Global judgment of the tolerability by the Investigator
secondary_outcome.description: Scoring on a scale from 1 to 4

secondary_outcome.measure: Global judgment of the tolerability by the patient
secondary_outcome.description: Scoring on a scale from 1 to 4

arm_group.description: Formulation containing WO533 for intravaginal application

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Post-menopausal women with subjective symptomatology of vulvovaginal atrophy
- Signed written informed consent before participation in the trial
Exclusion Criteria:
- Known hypersensitivity against any of the ingredients of the investigational product
- Systemic hormonal replacement therapy, or phytohormonal therapy or use of SERMs within 3 months before and / or during the conduct of the trial
- Local hormonal therapy (vagina/vulva) within 3 months before the trial
- If in the opinion of the investigator the patient should not participate in the study for any reason

overall_official.affiliation: Dr. August Wolff GmbH & Co. KG Arzneimittel
proDERM Institute for Applied Dermatological Research, Germany
